committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designate April 19 of each year as Revolutionary War Day.

summary.text: Designates April 19th of each year as "Revolutionary War Day". Requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to observe such day with appropriate ceremonies. Encourages schools to place particular emphasis, that day, upon the study of the Constitution and Declaration of Independence.

titles.title: Joint resolution designate April 19 of each year as Revolutionary War Day.
